slides.title: Free Social Posting

content.headline: We'll Handle Your Social Media This Week
content.subhead: Free trial—no credit card, no commitment

slides.narration: What if someone handled your social media for a week—for free? No credit card, no commitment. Just to show you what's possible. That's exactly what we're offering. Let us post for you this week and see the difference.

slides.title: What You Get

included.detail: Posted when your audience is active
See how posts performed at week's end

slides.narration: Here's what your free trial includes. Five posts created—custom content for your business, not generic templates. Posted to your channels—Facebook, Instagram, or both. Trained on your voice and brand. Posted at optimal times when your audience is most active. And a performance report at the end showing how posts performed. This is worth a hundred fifty dollars or more if you hired someone. Yours free to try.

slides.title: Sample Posts

samples.example: Meet the team / See how we work
Quick tip related to your expertise

slides.narration: Here's what we'd post for your business. Monday: behind-the-scenes content—meet the team, see how you work. Wednesday: a tip or value post related to your expertise. Friday: customer spotlight—a success story or testimonial. Saturday: community connection—weekend plans, local tie-in. Sunday: soft sell—reminder of services or a special offer. Variety that keeps your audience engaged.

slides.title: How It Works

steps.detail: Secure connection to your social profiles
See the results, decide if you want to continue

slides.narration: Here's how it works. Sign up in two minutes—just basic info about your business. Connect your accounts—secure connection to your social profiles. Review the first posts—you approve before anything goes live. We post all week while you focus on your business. Get your performance report at the end and decide if you want to continue. Zero risk, all upside.

slides.title: Start Your Trial

content.headline: Ready to Try It Free?
content.assurance: No credit card required. Cancel anytime. Posts require your approval.

slides.narration: Ready to try it free? Start your trial now—no credit card required, cancel anytime, and every post requires your approval before it goes live. Or see more examples first. Either way, this is your chance to see what consistent social media could do for your business—without lifting a finger.
